company_introduction:
Wiser care, We always there to Care

Wiser care has many strength points and a nearly complete portfolio. The range of product includes Antibiotics, Anticoccidial, antiparasitic, antimycotoxin, enzymes, vitamins , minerals. The products are local and imported,WSP, Feed additives and injection. The number of products are 40 products
mission_description: Is to provide society with excellent products and perfect services by creation of an innovative solutions that improve the quality of the animal life and satisfy customer needs.
name: Website About Us Settings

team_members.bio:
He was X- sales supervisor at Deltavet center and Intermedica Vet, Khaled was a partner and owner of a pharmaceutical Veterinary Company since 2013
Wiser Care is an extension of his experience as entrepreneur
He has 10 years’ experience in marketing of Vet. Medicine and feed additives
He has full knowledge of management and customer relationships.

Dr. Ahmed was the sales manager of Intermedica Vet company for 9 years.
he has a massive relations and deep experience in veterinary markets and he is setting the sales plans and marketing strategy.

Dr Hossam was the technical manager of Deltavet center, Intermedica Vet and Wadi poultry for 10 years. He is responsible for all technical and registration related issues, and he is the contact link between wiser care and all agencies (Cudy Future , Hungary - Greenman, Hungary - Ultracare,  Italy - El Nile Co for Pharmaceutical and Chemical industries - Arabian Co. for Pharmaceutical and Chemical industries)

title: About Us
vision_description: Is to lead animal health industry in Egypt and  Middle East by making  an extraordinary improvement in veterinary  fields through the most advanced technologies and ideas.
